mapper.select: SELECT p.*, c.category_name FROM product AS p LEFT JOIN category AS c ON p.category_id = c.id WHERE p.id = #{id};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product(name, price, unit, category_id, cover_img, introduction, detail_img, shop_id, nums) VALUES(#{name}, #{price}, #{unit}, #{category_id}, #{cover_img}, #{introduction}, #{detail_img}, #{shop_id}, #{nums});
mapper.update:
UPDATE product
name = #{name},
price = #{price},
unit = #{unit},
category_id = #{category_id},
cover_img = #{cover_img},
introduction = #{introduction},
detail_img = #{detail_img},
shop_id = #{shop_id},
nums = #{nums}
WHERE id = #{id}
